118121.「……来たか <pc>よ。\n 今日は 何用じゃ？\n<break>:
Ah, you've come, <pc>.
What is it today?
<break>

118357.「わしは ５つの理を学び\n おのれを究めんとする者たちを 導く者。\n 人呼ん:
I am one who learns the five principles, and teaches those willing to learn them. I'm what you call a Master.
Hmm, it seems as if you've come into possession of a Master Orb.
The Master Orb is a living jewel that will level up by receiving experience.
When the Master Orb levels up, it gains power in the form of Master Points. These can help you to become stronger.
However, Master Points alone are useless. You will need something called a "jewel", which contain various abilities.
Jewels can be obtained from monsters. If you bring these jewels to me, I can unlock their hidden abilities for you.
You must allocate Master Points to these abilities in order for them to work.
Well, it's better to try it for yourself. I'll unlock one jewel's ability for you. Here, take it.

118513.「何について 聞きたいのじゃ？\n<break>:
What would you like to ask about?
<break>

118514.「達人のオーブとは おぬしが経験値を得ることで\n レベルアップする 生きた宝石:
The Master Orb is a living jewel that will level up by receiving experience.
When the Master Orb levels up, it gains power in the form of Master Points. These can help you to become stronger.
However, Master Points alone are useless. You will need something called a jewel, which contain various abilities.
If you bring these jewels to me, I can unlock their hidden abilities for you.
You must allocate Master Points to these abilities in order for them to work.
There are different types of Master Points that are produced when the Master Orb levels up in the form of elements.
For example, Fire Master Points can only be used with Fire Jewels.
However, keep in mind that the Master Orb level is common across all attributes.

118517.「宝珠ポイントとは 『鑑定する』で\n 鑑定した宝珠の数と 同じだけ授けられる\:
Jewel Points are awarded to you equal to the number of jewels you have appraised.
As a reward for finding many jewels, you can use these points to exchange for a variety of items.

118518.「他に 何か 聞きたいことはあるかの？\n<break>:
Are there any other questions you'd like to
ask?
<break>

118526.「では 鑑定したい物を 選ぶがよい。\n<break>:
Then, choose the one you would like appraised.
<break>

118529.「おぬしは 鑑定の必要な 宝珠を\n 持っていないようじゃな。\n<bw_bre:
It seems that you don't have any jewels that
can be appraised.
<bw_break>

118539.「他に 用は あるかの？\n<break>:
Is there anything else I can do?
<break>

118656.<pipipi_off>\n<pc>は\n炎の宝珠を 手に入れた！\n<se_n:
received a Fire Jewel!
Now, you should allocate Master Points in the "Master Orb" menu under "Misc.".
The amount of Master Points you can allocate will increase as your Master Orb's level increases.

120011.「わしは ５つの理を学び\n おのれを究めんとする者たちを 導く者。\n 人呼ん:
I am one who learns the five principles, and teaches those willing to learn them. I'm what you call a Master.
Hmm.. you have a good eye. You should continue to work hard. Maybe one day, I can show you the way.

120412.「『達人クエスト』では\n 週に一度 すべての冒険者に向けて\n ５つのクエスト:
With "Master Quests", adventurers will be presented with 5 quests each week.
You can choose only one, so choose which suits you best. Also, you may complete it with companions if you so wish.
After completing the quest, I will give you jewels of the attribute of your choice. I hope that you choose to take up this challenge.

122111.今 受けている達人クエストを キャンセルして\nこの達人クエストを 受けますか？:
Would you like to cancel your currently
accepted Master Quest in order to accept a
new one?
<yesno 2><close>

122113.「受注したクエストは 『さくせん』の\n 『達人のオーブ』で いつでも確認できる:
You can check your accepted quest under the
"Master Orb" menu in "Misc.". When you've
completed it, you should come back to me.
<bw_break>

122114.「どうやら 達人クエストを達成したようじゃな！\n 見事であるぞ <pc>よ。\:
So you've completed a Master Quest, I see!
Wonderful job, <pc>. I'll give
you your reward right away.
<bw_break>

122115.「おぬしは 達人クエストを受注中のようじゃな。\n もし 挑戦するクエストを 変:
You seem to already have a Master Quest
accepted. If you'd like to change it, please
select a new one you'd like to challenge.
<end>

122116.「うむっ。それでは <%sM_ELEMENT>を\n <%nM_NUM>こで よ:
Very well. Then <%dM_NUM> <%sM_ELEMENT> is
what you would like?
<yesno><close>

122117.「では 受け取るがよい。\n おぬしの さらなる飛躍に役立てることを\n 祈って:
Here, take it. I pray that they will be useful
in furthering your growth.
<end>

122118.「達人クエストに 挑戦するのじゃな。\n では 今週のお題は これじゃ！\n<e:
Challenge the Master Quest, hm? Here is this
week's theme!
<end>

122119.「それは おぬしが今 受注中のクエストじゃな。\n もし 挑戦するクエストを 変:
You have already accepted that quest. If you'd
like to change the quest you want to
challenge, please accept that one.
<end>

122122.「『達人クエスト』では\n 週に一度 すべての冒険者に向けて\n ５つのクエスト:
With "Master Quests", adventurers will be presented with 5 quests each week.
You can choose only one, so choose which suits you best. Also, you may complete it with companions if you so wish.
After completing the quest, I will give you jewels of the attribute of your choice. Come on, give it a try!.

122123.「達人クエストに挑めるのは 週に一度きりじゃ。\n <%nM_DAY>日後に 新:
You can only undertake a single Master Quest
per week. There will be a new quest in <%dM_DAY>
days. Please come back then.
<bw_break>

122124.「では どのチカラの宝珠にするか\n 選ぶがよい。\n<select_se_of:
Then, which jewel element will you choose?
<select_se_off>
Fire Jewel
Water Jewel
Wind Jewel
Light Jewel
Dark Jewel
<select_end>
<break>

122125.「……と 言いたいところじゃが\n どうぐかばんがいっぱいで 報酬が渡せぬな。\:
...is what I want to say, but your bag is full
so I can't reward you. <%dM_NUM> empty slots are
needed, so please come back again.
<bw_break>

122558.「この宝珠を 鑑定するのじゃな？\n<yesno><break>:
This is the jewel you want to appraise?
<yesno><break>

122560.「この石版を 鑑定するのじゃな？\n<yesno><break>: YOU WILL NEVER SEE THIS PART 2

123212.受けている達人クエストを キャンセルして\n新しい 達人クエストを受けました。\:
You cancelled your current Master Quest and
accepted a new one.
<me 74><end>

125167.「光の宝珠？じゃな。\n では どちらにするか\n 選ぶがよい。\n<selec:
Light Jewel, hm? Which type would you like?
<select_se_off>
Skill Jewel
Special Move Jewel
<select_end>
<break>

259738.「<pc>よ 来たか。\n 順調に 修練を重ねているようじゃの。\n そんなおぬ: wow, that sure is a whole lot of text you will NEVER SEE

259740.「今 所持している 未鑑定の物を\n まとめて鑑定するが よいか？\n<yesn:
Would you like to me to appraise all of your
unappraised items at once?
<yesno><break>

259741.「これは…！ <%sM_JEWEL_NAME>！\n おぬしに 新たな能力が 開:
That's... <%sM_JEWEL_NAME>!!
You've developed a new ability. The jewel
has also been converted into <%dM_HOUJU_P> Jewel Point.

259742.「<%sM_JEWEL_NAME> じゃな。\n おぬしは すでに 開花している:
<%sM_JEWEL_NAME>, I see.
You already know this ability. The jewel
has also been converted into <%dM_HOUJU_P> Jewel Point.

336738.「では どのチカラの宝珠にするか\n 選ぶがよい。\n<break>:
Very well. Please choose which jewel
element you would like.
<break>

336739.「光の宝珠？じゃな。\n では どちらにするか\n 選ぶがよい。\n<break:
Light Jewel, I see.
Which of the two would you like?
<break>

336740.「どのチカラの 詳細を確認するのだ？\n<break>:
Which element's details would you prefer
to check?
<break>

336742.「今から１時間だけ\n 魔物が宝珠を 落としやすくなる香水を\n かけてしんぜよ:
I can apply a perfume to you that will last for 1 hour. During this time, monsters are more likely to drop jewels.
I can do this only once per day. Would you like me to apply some Jewel Perfume?

336743.「ん？ すでに香水が かかっておるようじゃな。\n 今 かかっている香りの効果は:
Hm? It appears you already have a perfume
applied. If I apply this, your current effect
will be overwritten. Is that all right?
<yesno2><break>

336744.「さぁ 宝珠の香水が かかったぞ！\n よりいっそうの 鍛錬に はげむがよい。\:
The Jewel Perfume has been applied!
Now go, and train even harder!
<end>

336745.「今日の分の 香水は もうかけてしまったぞ。\n 翌日 朝６時以降に また来るが:
I've already applied perfume for you today.
Come back the following day at 6 am (JST).
<end>

336746.「そなたの持つ 達人ポイントを\n わしの オススメする宝珠に 割り振って \n:
I will allocate your Master Points to jewels
that I recommend and set their jewel levels
for you.
<bw_break>

336747.「今の 宝珠レベルはリセットするから\n 気をつけて 選ぶのじゃぞ。\n どのチ:

set jewels will be reset. Which element would
you like me to allocate points to?
<break>
